pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a slow, tracking shot that moves from left to right across the scene. The shot reveals a 3D rendering of a large facility with several white, dome-like structures set in a reddish, arid landscape. The only movement in the frame is the smooth motion of the camera.
